statements.select: select t.C_CARNAME, t.C_CARNAME2, t.C_CARNAME3, t.C_CONTAINERNO, t.I_CONTAINERSTATUS, t.C_CAMERATIME, t.C_PHOTOADDRESS, t.C_PONDNO, t.C_RESERVE1, t.C_RESERVE2 from SM_JZXH_Info t where t.C_CAMERATIME > tochar(sysdate-5/1440,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') order by t.C_CAMERATIME desc

select a.*,rownum from (select t.C_CARNAME, t.C_CARNAME2, t.C_CARNAME3, t.C_CONTAINERNO, t.I_CONTAINERSTATUS, t.C_CAMERATIME, t.C_PHOTOADDRESS, t.C_PONDNO, t.C_RESERVE1, t.C_RESERVE2 from SM_JZXH_Info t where t.I_CONTAINERSTATUS=1 and t.C_CAMERATIME > to_char(sysdate-20/1440,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') and (t.C_CARNAME=#CarName# or t.C_CARNAME2=#CarName# or t.C_CARNAME3=#CarName#)
t.C_PONDNO=#pondid#
order by t.C_CAMERATIME desc ) a where rownum=1

select t.C_CARNAME, t.C_CARNAME2, t.C_CARNAME3, t.C_CONTAINERNO, t.I_CONTAINERSTATUS, t.C_CAMERATIME, t.C_PHOTOADDRESS, t.C_PONDNO, t.C_RESERVE1, t.C_RESERVE2 from SM_JZXH_Info t where 1=1
(t.C_CARNAME=#carName# or t.C_CARNAME2=#carName# or t.C_CARNAME3=#carName#)
t.C_CAMERATIME between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
order by t.I_INTID desc
